verse:
न तत्र सूर्यो भाति न चन्द्रतारकं नेमा विद्युतो भान्ति कुतोऽयमग्निः।
तमेव भान्तमनुभाति सर्वं तस्य भासा सर्वमिदं विभाति॥

terms.न तत्र सूर्यो भाति: There the sun does not shine
terms.कुतोऽयमग्निः: From where does this fire come?
terms.तमेव भान्तमनुभाति सर्वं: It is by shining, everything else shines
terms.तस्य भासा सर्वमिदं विभाति: Through its radiance, everything else is illuminated
terms.In this verse from the Katha Upanishad,: pervading nature of this divine light and its ability to illumine everything in existence. It suggests that this divine fire is the ultimate source of light and knowledge, which enables the perception and understanding of the entire universe.
